Articles.Content:
How exactly do I make a space station? Do I need to build it on ground first and launch it into orbit?

Is there is good parts add-on that I can use?

There are some good mods for space stations. One is crewtank for extra crew on the space shuttle.Another good mod is the Probodobodyne construction kit for solar panels and other things. Usually you need to launch it from the ground with tons of boosters and engines to get into orbit.Or you can use orbital construction to launch it from another orbiting spaceship,but you need to launch supplies up to build the space station so I can't recommend it. I don't have any advice on building it,but good luck!

My Favourite is Kosmos spacecraft design Bureau. It hasn't been updated yet, but when it is, it will be here.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/17165-0-16-Kosmos-Spacecraft-Design-Bureau-VA-released

And yes you need to build it on the ground first then launch it like a rocket. This is because there is no space station thing in the game yet.

The orbital construction mod actually is pretty cool. The whole point of that mod is to launch several flights to bring the materials for assembly in orbit.

Another way is to build the station in the VAB or SPH, put it on the launch pad or runway, then edit the persistent.sfs file to swap its location with a different ship already in orbit.
